DOC.brief_summary: The study 's main objective investigate effect acute consumption preparation contain 100 mg specific phenolic compound ( patent pending , P201531587 ) systolic BP ingestion high fat meal .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Specific Phenolic Compound Blood Pressure
DOC.detailed_description: The study 's main objective investigate effect acute consumption preparation contain 100 mg specific phenolic compound ( patent pending , P201531587 ) systolic blood pressure ( BP ) ingestion high fat meal . The secondary objective : - To evaluate effect diastolic BP . - To study phenolic compound bioavailability analyze metabolite determine phenolic compound consumption biomarkers . - To evaluate effect endothelial function ischemic reactive hyperemia ( IRH ) . The sample size calculate use previous study use systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) primary outcome measure . A total 14 subject need , assume variance component approximately 20.0 , detect difference treatment ( placebo phenolic product ) 10 mmHg , bilateral significance level α=0.05 , power 80 % standard deviation 11.82 mmHg baseline . To compare main variable efficiency product study well secondary variable efficiency , carry analysis covariance ( ANCOVA ) basal value covariable , follow Tukey test determine multiple difference . All test carry significance bilateral level 5 % . It consider significant value p < 0,05 . The data analyze use `` SPSS '' program version 22 . The statistical analysis follow principle specify guideline International Conference Harmonization ( ICH ) E9 CPMP/EWP/908/99 ICH E9 Points Consider Multiplicity Issues Clinical Trials .
DOC.criteria: Adults men woman ( > 18 year old ) Blood pressure ( drug intervention ) ≥130 mm Hg systolic blood pressure ≤ 159 mmHg No evidence chronic disease Written inform consent provide initial screening visit . Systolic blood pressure ≥ 160 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure ≥100 mm Hg take antihypertensive medication Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 35 kg/m2 Glucose ( fast state ) > 125 mg/dL LDLcholesterol > 189 mg/dL Triglycerides > 350 mg/dL Pregnant intend become pregnant Use medication , antioxidant , multivitamin supplement Chronic alcoholism Intense physical activity ( 5h/week ) Intestinal disorder Following vegetarian diet Anemia ( hemoglobin ≤13 g/dL men ≤12 g/dL woman ) Being intolerant suffer allergy product high fat meal ( white bread , olive oil , boil egg , cheese ) product study . Current past participation clinical trial consumption research product 30 day prior inclusion study . Failure follow study guideline .
